tool_description: The Rakuten Genre Search API can retrieve genre names and their structure that are used in Rakuten Ichiba. Developers can retrieve the genre information using Genre ID.
name: Rakuten Marketplace Genre Search
title: Rakuten Marketplace Genre Search

api_list.name: /services/api/IchibaGenre/Search/20120723
api_list.description: The Rakuten Genre Search API can retrieve genre names and their structure that are used in Rakuten Ichiba. Developers can retrieve the genre information using Genre ID.

required_parameters.name: genreId
required_parameters.description: Use genreId=0 to search from the genre root

optional_parameters.name: affiliateId
optional_parameters.description: Rakuten Affiliate ID number. When specified item links in the response payload will include this ID. You can receive affiliate rewards when an item is purchased through your link.

optional_parameters.name: genrePath
optional_parameters.description: 0: Exclude ancester genres  1: Display ancester genres  Ancestor genres are a set of genres in the upper levels (parent, grandparent, etc.)
